title: Plugging in the Ordered Triplet
text:
We must plug in the values $$x=3, y=-2$$, and $$z=1$$ into the system of equations.
$$3-2+1=2$$. This is true.
6(3)-4(-2)+5(1)=31. This is also true.
5(3)+2(-2)+2(1)=13. This is also true. This meaens that the ordered pair is a solution and the answer is 'y'.
speech:
We must plug in the values  x is equal to 3, comma y is equal to, negative 2 , and  z, is equal to, 1  into the system of equations.
 3, minus 2 plus 1 is equal to 2 . This is true.
6(3)-4(-2)+5(1)=31. This is also true.
5(3)+2(-2)+2(1)=13. This is also true. This meaens that the ordered pair is a solution and the answer is 'y'.
